description: Detects potential persistence activity via outlook home pages.
author: Tobias Michalski (Nextron Systems)
name: Potential Persistence Via Outlook Home Page
query: (winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\Software\\Microsoft\\Office\\* OR *\\Outlook\\WebView\\*) AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\URL AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\Calendar\\* OR *\\Inbox\\*))
